mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_product_class (class_id, class_name, comment, is_parent, parent_class_code, is_deleted, create_people, create_time, update_people, update_time, version) values (#{classId}, #{className}, #{comment}, #{isParent}, #{parentClassCode}, 0, #{createPeople}, now(), #{updatePeople}, now(), 0)
mapper.select: select count(class_name) from t_sys_product_class where class_name = #{className} and is_deleted=0
select class_name className, comment comment from t_sys_product_class where class_id=#{classId} and is_deleted=0
mapper.update: update t_sys_product_class set class_name = #{className}, comment = #{comment}, update_people = #{updatePeople}, update_time = now(), version = version+1 where class_id=#{classId} and version=#{version}
mapper.select: select a.class_id as id, a.class_name as name, b.class_id as id2, b.class_name as name2 from t_sys_product_class a, t_sys_product_class b where a.class_id=b.parent_class_code and a.is_deleted=0 and b.is_deleted=0
select count(class_id) from t_sys_product_class where parent_class_code=#{classId} and is_deleted=0
mapper.update: update t_sys_product_class set is_deleted=1, update_people = #{updatePeople}, update_time = now(), version =version+1 where class_id =#{classId} and is_deleted=0
